page.title: 17SKENE ESTATE
page.content: {Skene Estate}remained in the hands of the Skene family for over 500 years. {Skene House}was the home of the Laird of Skene.When the Skene line came to an end,the{Duke of Fife}inherited the Estate.He gave the Estate to a member of his family as a wedding present.The {Hamilton family}ran the Estate for over 100 years but the Hamilton family came to an end in the 1940's when the only son of the Laird was killed in Crete during World War II.His mother, Lady Hamilton became involved with the Forces services after this and she was asked to provide accomodation for members of the armed forces.She converted what is now the west wing into three apartments;however only one was ever occupied.Lady Hamilton eventually closed up most of the house and coverted 3 appartments back into one dwelling in which she lived.
